text: The sinews of war are infinite money.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: Money is like manure, of very little use except it be spread.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money.
author: Johnny Cash

text: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
author: Arthur Schopenhauer
